programme.title: Stuff the British Stole
programme.desc: Stephen Fry joins Marc Fennell on a gripping adventure, from the pinnacle of the Acropolis to a secluded robotics lab high in the Tuscan mountains to a shipwreck under the Aegean Sea.

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: Back Roads heads to Nimmitabel in NSW, one of Australias highest altitude towns. Heather Ewart finds Nimmitabel has survived against all odds, by trying wild ideas such as a Steampunk festival.

programme.title: Guy Montgomerys Guy Mont-Spelling Bee
programme.desc: Denise Scott, Kirsty Webeck and Takashi Wakasugi and the current leading champion play as Guy insists they wear and spell unusual hats, and Aaron reveals his new Greengrocer business.

programme.title: ABC News at Noon
programme.desc: Ros Childs presents the leading news at lunchtime, including the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter.

programme.title: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: News from Paul Harvey leads Ffion to a shocking revelation about Ricks past.

programme.title: Fake or Fortune?
programme.desc: Nicky Philipps, a portrait artist renowned for her pictures of the royal family, has asked the team to investigate a painting believed to be by celebrated impressionist Pierre Auguste Renoir.

programme.title: Claire Hoopers House of Games
programme.desc: In Claire Hoopers House of Games this week, stage star Lucy Durack, horticulturist Jamie Durie, and comedians Dilruk Jayasinha and Lizzy Hoo compete for the grand prize - a trophy or a spoon holder that looks like a crab.

programme.title: Anhs Brush With Fame
programme.desc: Peter Garrett is one of the nations most intriguing rock stars. Hes lived on many stages, as frontman of Midnight Oil, activist, and a politician. Anh creates a portrait that is as striking as the man himself.

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan and his team accept the challenge of creating a suitable garden for the Chapman family, whose twin girls have both been diagnosed with a serious, life-limiting condition.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: A mother looks for her daughter from whom she was separated when she was just 10 days old. The babys father has spent a lifetime yearning for the chance to give his daughter a hug.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team visit Northern Ireland for a busy day of evaluations at Castle Coole near Enniskillen. Amongst the objects catching the experts eyes are a pair of tea caddies that raise suspicions.

programme.title: Claire Hoopers House of Games
programme.desc: In Claire Hoopers House of Games this week, stage star Lucy Durack, horticulturist Jamie Durie, and comedians Dilruk Jayasinha and Lizzy Hoo compete for the grand prize - a trophy or a spoon holder that looks like a crab.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.
David Speers presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: Joanna Lumleys adventure continues in Austrias Wachau Valley with wineries and the Donau-Auen National Parks turtle conservation. She visits Bratislava and the Tatras, ending with ground squirrels in Muran National Park.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: A former Olympic snowboarder and her builder husband take on a mountainous challenge when they decide to build a unique shed-like home on a remote ridge in Victorias Strath Creek.

programme.title: Griffs Great Australian Rail Trip
programme.sub-title: Rawalinna to Sydney - What is an Australian?
programme.desc: Continuing his journey on the Indian Pacific, Griff traverses three states, alighting in Adelaide, Broken Hill and, finally, Sydney to discover the diverse definitions of what makes Australia.

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan and his team accept the challenge of creating a suitable garden for the Chapman family, whose twin girls have both been diagnosed with a serious, life-limiting condition.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: A mother looks for her daughter from whom she was separated when she was just 10 days old. The babys father has spent a lifetime yearning for the chance to give his daughter a hug.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Australias longest-running music show is home to the biggest vault of music videos from a diverse range of artists, genres, and eras. They curate the best clips of all-time to entertain for hours.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia
programme.sub-title: 1980: George Negus, Chantal Contouri, Enid Lorimer
programme.desc: Take a trip back to 1980 where Michael Parkinson spoke with interview guests George Negus, Chantal Contouri and Enid Lorimer.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Costa tours an experts vegie patch; Jane cultivates autumn colour; Josh learns about a plant pathogen; Tammy suggests plants for shade; Millie tours a bushwalk for those with dementia; Sophie meets a carnivorous collector.
David Speers presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: News Breakfast
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato present the latest news, overnight developments and todays top stories plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Dan Bourchier.

programme.title: Planet America
programme.desc: From bunker-busting bombs to F-bombs, Trump lashes out at Israel and Iran over ceasefire violations. Plus leaked intelligence disputes Trumps claim that US bombs "obliterated" Irans nuclear sites. (Midseason Final)

programme.title: Take 5 With Zan Rowe
programme.desc: Bill Bailey captures humanity across five songs, taking you back to his childhood days, the recent loss of a deep friendship, and the song he wants played at his funeral.

programme.title: Little Disasters
programme.desc: Police and Social Services investigate jointly. The friendship group fractures on a past holiday.

programme.title: ABC News at Noon
programme.desc: Ros Childs presents the leading news at lunchtime, including the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter.

programme.title: Bay of Fires
programme.desc: Tensions rise to boiling as Stella scrambles, again, to adapt to her new way of life - but when someone escapes the towns clutches, it begs the question; If they can leave, why cant Stella?

programme.title: Fake or Fortune?
programme.desc: Charles Henty has been left with a working farm to run in France and a crippling inheritance tax bill to pay. The only way he can do that is by selling two paintings he owns - if he can prove theyre genuine.

programme.title: Claire Hoopers House of Games
programme.desc: In Claire Hoopers House of Games this week, stage star Lucy Durack, horticulturist Jamie Durie, and comedians Dilruk Jayasinha and Lizzy Hoo compete for the grand prize - a trophy or a spoon holder that looks like a crab.

programme.title: Anhs Brush With Fame
programme.desc: Kate Ritchie grew up in front of the nation. She was cast as Sally on Home and Away and played the role for two decades, with her own experiences reflected in her character. Anh must capture her warmth and authenticity.

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan and his team come to the aid of wounded war hero Luke Simpson, who lost his leg on his last tour of duty. Luke has always been a keen gardener but has struggled to create a garden of his dreams.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: The story of a mother unable to forgive herself for giving away her daughter more than forty years ago, and a son who needs to understand why his mother was unable to keep him.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team of experts visit Layer Marney Tower in Essex. Among the objects under scrutiny is the first aid box that accompanied Shackleton on his Endurance expedition to the Antarctic in 1914.

programme.title: Claire Hoopers House of Games
programme.desc: In Claire Hoopers House of Games, stage star Lucy Durack, horticulturist Jamie Durie, and comedians Dilruk Jayasinha and Lizzy Hoo compete for the grand prize - a trophy or a spoon holder that looks like a crab. (Final)

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.sub-title: Winter: Escape to the Tropics and Native Colour
programme.desc: Costa picks plants for winter colour, Jerry has the latest on the fire ant outbreak, Sophie meets a local garden hero, Millie Ross grows bare root plants.

programme.title: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: Helen is missing as the countdown to day seven nears. Will Helen be the next victim?

programme.title: Gruen
programme.desc: The Gruen team solve one of lifes great mysteries. What has more layers, Westpacs scam protection or Kleenexs new luxury tissue? Plus, we juggle chainsaws. Wil, Todd and Russel are joined by Carolyn Miller and Liana Rossi.

programme.title: Guy Montgomerys Guy Mont-Spelling Bee
programme.desc: Denise Scott, Kirsty Webeck and Takashi Wakasugi and the current leading champion play as Guy insists they wear and spell unusual hats, and Aaron reveals his new Greengrocer business.

programme.title: Spicks and Specks
programme.desc: Natalie Bassingthwaighte, Nina Oyama, Sam Cromack and Steph Tisdell join Alan, Myf and Adam. Nina lives out her furry fantasies, Steph gets owned by Delta Goodrem and Sarah Blaskos performance will give you goosebumps.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the days events, explaining whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: After a surprising breakthrough in Jays case, Nikki struggles to accept that Scott may not be responsible. Meanwhile, DI Mason asks Jack and Nikki to investigate the death of someone close to the case.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Discover the wildest new music videos on rage. Essential grooves and boundary-pushing visuals from Australia and beyond.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going as the sun comes up with continuous music videos, from new releases to classics and the songs weve long forgotten.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Fauziah Ibrahim and Thomas Oriti bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: rage: Guest Programmer
programme.desc: After teaming up for their album Ill Times last year, GUM and Ambrose Kenny-Smith bring their collaborative powers to the rage couch!

programme.title: ABC News at Noon
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Mountain
programme.desc: An exploration of our obsessions with high places and how they have come to capture our imagination, with an original score from the Australian Chamber Orchestra.

programme.title: Jane Austen: Rise of a Genius
programme.desc: At 27, Jane Austen is still unpublished. But despite facing the loss of her father throwing her family into turmoil, she succeeds in publishing Sense and Sensibility, followed by the enormous success of Pride and Prejudice.

programme.title: Eumeralla, A War Requiem For Peace
programme.desc: Written and composed by Yorta Yorta soprano, composer and Artistic Director of Short Black Opera, Deborah Cheetham Fraillon AO, this requiem for peace, is sung entirely in the ancient dialects of the Gunditjmara people.

programme.title: Classic 100
programme.desc: The Classic 100 Concert returns to celebrate Australias favourite piano pieces, performed by the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra. Led by Benjamin Northey and a stellar lineup of guests including Andrea Lam from ABCs The Piano.

programme.title: Spicks and Specks
programme.desc: Natalie Bassingthwaighte, Nina Oyama, Sam Cromack and Steph Tisdell join Alan, Myf and Adam. Nina lives out her furry fantasies, Steph gets owned by Delta Goodrem and Sarah Blaskos performance will give you goosebumps.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In this prequel to the blockbuster Mummy films, a mercenary is hired by a dissident alliance to kill the beautiful sorceress Cassandra, from whom the brutal tyrant Memnon draws his strength. Once Cassandra is removed the alliance plans to face Memnons armies on their own terms, but the sorceress is not all she seems in this swirling, CGI-laden romp.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: When the abandoned islands dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

programme.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
programme.desc: With Spider-Mans identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The Angels, three investigative agents (Barrymore, Diaz and Liu) who work for the Charles Townsend Detective Agency, return for another high-octane series of adventures as they investigate the theft of a database of witness protection profiles, after five of the people on the list are murdered. Theyre aided by a new Bosley (Bernie Mac), in an adventure which pits them against a fallen angel (Moore), their old nemesis, the Thin Man (Glover), and others.

programme.title: Smokin Aces
programme.desc: After snitching mob secrets to the FBI, a $1 million contract is put out on Buddy Aces Israel. Now, everybody wants him dead.

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: When army commando Amrit finds out his true love Tulika is engaged against her will, he boards a New Delhi-bound train in a daring quest to derail the arranged marriage. But when a gang of knife-wielding thieves led by the ruthless Fani begin to terrorize innocent passengers on his train, Amrit takes them on himself in a death-defying kill-spree to save those around him - turning what should have been a typical commute into an adrenaline-fueled thrill ride.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: After failing to fight for his family during a robbery, an unassuming father calls on skills from his hidden past to become a lethal vigilante blazing a wild ride to revenge.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: The globe-spanning conflict between otherworldly monsters of mass destruction and the human-piloted supermachines built to vanquish them was only a prelude to the all-out assault on humanity in "Pacific Rim Uprising." Jake Pentecost, is a once-promising Jaeger pilot whose legendary father gave his life to secure humanitys victory against the monstrous "Kaiju." Jake has since abandoned his training only to become caught up in a criminal underworld. But when an even more unstoppable threat is unleashed to tear through our cities and bring the world to its knees, he is given one last chance to live up to his fathers legacy by his estranged sister, Mako Mori who is leading a brave new generation of pilots that have grown up in the shadow of war. As they seek justice for the fallen, their only hope is to unite together in a global uprising against the forces of extinction.

programme.title: Escape Room: Tournament of Champions
programme.desc: Six people unwittingly find themselves locked in another series of escape rooms, slowly uncovering what they have in common to survive. Joining forces with two of the original survivors, they soon discover theyve all played the game before.

programme.title: Land of the Dead
programme.desc: Packed with more heart-pounding and blood-curdling thrills than any theatre could show, this special unleashes the ultimate vision of George A Romeros latest living-dead shock-fest.

programme.title: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Beck is a bounty hunter sent into the treacherous jungles of the Amazon to bring the rebellious Travis back to the States. When Beck and Travis reluctantly join forces to hunt down a priceless treasure, this unlikely team embarks on a pulse-pounding, nonstop thrill ride.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Evil Queen Ravenna betrays her good sister, Freya, with an unforgivable act, freezing Freyas heart of love and unleashing in her an icy power she never knew she possessed. Retreating to a kingdom far to the north, Freya raises an army of Huntsmen as her protectors, with the only rule that no two of them should ever fall in love.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner has anger management issues. His quiet life as a brilliant research scientist working with ex-girlfriend Betty Ross conceals a painful past. A freak lab accident reveals Bruces heroic impulses but also unleashes his inner demons. And he becomes the most powerful being on the face of the Earth: a superhero and a monster.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Forced into slavery by the corrupt heir to the throne, Roman general Maximus becomes a gladiator. His prowess in the arena leads him to Rome, the Colosseum, and a showdown with the new emperor.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Desperate to find their missing son, Paul and his wife Amanda trick eminent palaeontologist Dr Alan Grant into accompanying them to Isla Sorna. The small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Danny Trejo returns as the ruthless bookie, Goldberg, in the wildest, bloodiest, Death Race ever. After a failed attack on inmate and legendary driver, Frankenstein, Black Ops specialist Connor Gibson (Zach McGowan) infiltrates a super-maximum federal prison with one goal - enter the immoral and illegal Death Race and take Frankenstein down. Connor enlists the help of Baltimore Bob (Danny Glover) and Lists (Fred Koehler), and unexpectedly falls in love with bartending beauty Jane (Christine Marzano). Connor will have to fight for more than his life in this brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crashlanding puts a father and son on a dangerous planet - Earth. Hunted by an alien and by evolved animal species, the pair must work together to survive.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Half-human, half-Atlantean Arthur Curry goes on a journey that will not only force him to face who he really is, but to discover if he is worthy of who he was born to be, a king.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: A house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that curses those who enter it with a violent death.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Five friends head to a remote cabin where they discover the Book of the Dead, and they unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: This film re-creates the towering, true story of Alexander the Great, who, in the 4th Century BC, conquered Greece, Persia, Afghanistan and India - 90% of the "Known World." Against massive armies of chariots and elephants, he never lost a battle! Visionary, explorer, and dreamer - he was also a tender son, torn by his mothers burning love and ambition, and desperate for his fathers approval. His dream shaped the world we live in today.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: When a scientific expedition to an uncharted island awakens titanic forces of nature, a mission of discovery becomes an explosive war between monster and man.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Men in Black follows the exploits of Agents Kay and Jay, members of a top-secret organization established to monitor alien activity on Earth. The two MIB find themselves in the middle of a deadly plot by an intergalactic terrorist, who has arrived on Earth to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies. Kay and Jay face a simple imperative: track down the interloper or Earth will be destroyed. Its all in a days work for the Men in Black.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Mans greatest battle begins when an evil corporation attempts world domination by deploying an army of super villains to crush Peter Parker.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Set in ancient China, a mercenary travels east in search of gunpowder and discovers the mighty Great Wall and the terrible secret behind why it was built.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: When a chain of events finds the corpse of Imhotep resurrected in the British Museum, the mummy walks the Earth once more, determined to fulfil his quest for immortality. An even more powerful force born of the darkest rituals of ancient Egypt has also been set loose in the world. When these two forces clash, the fate of the world will hang in the balance, sending the OConnells on a desperate race to save the world.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In this prequel to the blockbuster Mummy films, a mercenary is hired by a dissident alliance to kill the beautiful sorceress Cassandra, from whom the brutal tyrant Memnon draws his strength. programme.desc: Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: When a chain of events finds the corpse of Imhotep resurrected in the British Museum, the mummy walks the Earth once more, determined to fulfil his quest for immortality. An even more powerful force born of the darkest rituals of ancient Egypt has also been set loose in the world. When these two forces clash, the fate of the world will hang in the balance, sending the OConnells on a desperate race to save the world.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In this prequel to the blockbuster Mummy films, a mercenary is hired by a dissident alliance to kill the beautiful sorceress Cassandra, from whom the brutal tyrant Memnon draws his strength. Once Cassandra is removed the alliance plans to face Memnons armies on their own terms, but the sorceress is not all she seems in this swirling, CGI-laden romp.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: When the abandoned islands dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

programme.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
programme.desc: With Spider-Mans identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The Angels, three investigative agents (Barrymore, Diaz and Liu) who work for the Charles Townsend Detective Agency, return for another high-octane series of adventures as they investigate the theft of a database of witness protection profiles, after five of the people on the list are murdered. Theyre aided by a new Bosley (Bernie Mac), in an adventure which pits them against a fallen angel (Moore), their old nemesis, the Thin Man (Glover), and others.

programme.title: Smokin Aces
programme.desc: After snitching mob secrets to the FBI, a $1 million contract is put out on Buddy Aces Israel. Now, everybody wants him dead.

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: When army commando Amrit finds out his true love Tulika is engaged against her will, he boards a New Delhi-bound train in a daring quest to derail the arranged marriage. But when a gang of knife-wielding thieves led by the ruthless Fani begin to terrorize innocent passengers on his train, Amrit takes them on himself in a death-defying kill-spree to save those around him - turning what should have been a typical commute into an adrenaline-fueled thrill ride.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: After failing to fight for his family during a robbery, an unassuming father calls on skills from his hidden past to become a lethal vigilante blazing a wild ride to revenge.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: The globe-spanning conflict between otherworldly monsters of mass destruction and the human-piloted supermachines built to vanquish them was only a prelude to the all-out assault on humanity in "Pacific Rim Uprising." Jake Pentecost, is a once-promising Jaeger pilot whose legendary father gave his life to secure humanitys victory against the monstrous "Kaiju." Jake has since abandoned his training only to become caught up in a criminal underworld. But when an even more unstoppable threat is unleashed to tear through our cities and bring the world to its knees, he is given one last chance to live up to his fathers legacy by his estranged sister, Mako Mori who is leading a brave new generation of pilots that have grown up in the shadow of war. As they seek justice for the fallen, their only hope is to unite together in a global uprising against the forces of extinction.

programme.title: Escape Room: Tournament of Champions
programme.desc: Six people unwittingly find themselves locked in another series of escape rooms, slowly uncovering what they have in common to survive. Joining forces with two of the original survivors, they soon discover theyve all played the game before.

programme.title: Land of the Dead
programme.desc: Packed with more heart-pounding and blood-curdling thrills than any theatre could show, this special unleashes the ultimate vision of George A Romeros latest living-dead shock-fest.

programme.title: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Beck is a bounty hunter sent into the treacherous jungles of the Amazon to bring the rebellious Travis back to the States. When Beck and Travis reluctantly join forces to hunt down a priceless treasure, this unlikely team embarks on a pulse-pounding, nonstop thrill ride.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Evil Queen Ravenna betrays her good sister, Freya, with an unforgivable act, freezing Freyas heart of love and unleashing in her an icy power she never knew she possessed. Retreating to a kingdom far to the north, Freya raises an army of Huntsmen as her protectors, with the only rule that no two of them should ever fall in love.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner has anger management issues. His quiet life as a brilliant research scientist working with ex-girlfriend Betty Ross conceals a painful past. A freak lab accident reveals Bruces heroic impulses but also unleashes his inner demons. And he becomes the most powerful being on the face of the Earth: a superhero and a monster.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Forced into slavery by the corrupt heir to the throne, Roman general Maximus becomes a gladiator. His prowess in the arena leads him to Rome, the Colosseum, and a showdown with the new emperor.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Desperate to find their missing son, Paul and his wife Amanda trick eminent palaeontologist Dr Alan Grant into accompanying them to Isla Sorna. The small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Danny Trejo returns as the ruthless bookie, Goldberg, in the wildest, bloodiest, Death Race ever. After a failed attack on inmate and legendary driver, Frankenstein, Black Ops specialist Connor Gibson (Zach McGowan) infiltrates a super-maximum federal prison with one goal - enter the immoral and illegal Death Race and take Frankenstein down. Connor enlists the help of Baltimore Bob (Danny Glover) and Lists (Fred Koehler), and unexpectedly falls in love with bartending beauty Jane (Christine Marzano). Connor will have to fight for more than his life in this brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crashlanding puts a father and son on a dangerous planet - Earth. Hunted by an alien and by evolved animal species, the pair must work together to survive.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Half-human, half-Atlantean Arthur Curry goes on a journey that will not only force him to face who he really is, but to discover if he is worthy of who he was born to be, a king.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: A house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that curses those who enter it with a violent death.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Five friends head to a remote cabin where they discover the Book of the Dead, and they unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: This film re-creates the towering, true story of Alexander the Great, who, in the 4th Century BC, conquered Greece, Persia, Afghanistan and India - 90% of the "Known World." Against massive armies of chariots and elephants, he never lost a battle! Visionary, explorer, and dreamer - he was also a tender son, torn by his mothers burning love and ambition, and desperate for his fathers approval. His dream shaped the world we live in today.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: When a scientific expedition to an uncharted island awakens titanic forces of nature, a mission of discovery becomes an explosive war between monster and man.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Men in Black follows the exploits of Agents Kay and Jay, members of a top-secret organization established to monitor alien activity on Earth. The two MIB find themselves in the middle of a deadly plot by an intergalactic terrorist, who has arrived on Earth to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies. Kay and Jay face a simple imperative: track down the interloper or Earth will be destroyed. Its all in a days work for the Men in Black.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Mans greatest battle begins when an evil corporation attempts world domination by deploying an army of super villains to crush Peter Parker.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Set in ancient China, a mercenary travels east in search of gunpowder and discovers the mighty Great Wall and the terrible secret behind why it was built.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: The Honor crew welcomes their first group of charter guests: a gaggle of flamboyant fashion photographers who prove to be a boat-load of trouble. Adrienne chews out Sam for failing to respect her authority, but Sam refuses to back down and the two stews butt heads.

programme.title: Below Deck Mediterranean
programme.sub-title: All Chained Up and No Place to Go
programme.desc: The naked guests distract the crew as they try to stay focused on their jobs. As Hannah and Bobby hash out their differences, Lauren struggles as the tension mounts between her and Bobby. Meanwhile, Bugsy maintains a stiff upper lip as she deals with the loss of her grandmother. programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: The series follows a group of crew members living and working aboard Honor, a 164 mega-yacht. The upstairs and downstairs worlds collide when this young and single crew, known as yachties, live, love, and work together on-board the luxurious, privately-owned yacht while tending to the ever-changing needs of their wealthy, demanding charter guests. While each crew member brings a different level of experience, they all share a love for this lifestyle that enables them to travel to some of the most beautiful and exotic locales in the world. Each episode features a different set of charter guests moving onto the boat from millionaires, to entertainers to hard-partying groups of well-heeled friends.

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: The Honor crew welcomes their first group of charter guests: a gaggle of flamboyant fashion photographers who prove to be a boat-load of trouble. Adrienne chews out Sam for failing to respect her authority, but Sam refuses to back down and the two stews butt heads.

programme.title: Below Deck Mediterranean

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: The crew enjoys a night out, but Kat enjoys a few too many cocktails. Flagg battles his control issues when he teams up with Bobby to sell a new condo development in West Hollywood. programme.title: Million Dollar Listing LA
programme.desc: In an attempt to sell a villa-esque listing that has sat on the market for a year, Altman rents a dunk tank to entice buyers who might love to see him drenched. James and David enter heated negotiations on two of Hollywoods famous homes: The Playboy Bunny Ranch and the home where the movie Mommie Dearest was filmed. Meanwhile, Flagg reunites with clients who previously fired him in an attempt to sell them a high-rise condo.

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: The Honor crew welcomes their first group of charter guests: a gaggle of flamboyant fashion photographers who prove to be a boat-load of trouble. Kat makes a shocking discovery that forces her into an agonising decision, should she rat out the guests and ruin the charter? Or risk serious consequences by turning a blind eye? Adrienne chews out Sam for failing to respect her authority, but Sam refuses to back down and the two stews butt heads.

programme.title: Below Deck Mediterranean
programme.sub-title: All Chained Up and No Place to Go
programme.desc: The naked guests distract the crew as they try to stay focused on their jobs. As Hannah and Bobby hash out their differences, Lauren struggles as the tension mounts between her and Bobby. Meanwhile, Bugsy maintains a stiff upper lip as she deals with the loss of her grandmother. When Captain Sandy joins the guests for dinner, Adam feels the heat as he strives to deliver the perfect meal. On the last day of charter, a massively twisted anchor chain leaves the crew and guests stranded at sea and threatens to sideline the Sirocco for the rest of the charter season.

programme.desc: Terry and Paul get schooled on bimbofication, while a high-risk patient seeks a seventh breast augmentation, and a twin undergoes nose surgery to look like his brother again.

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: The series follows a group of crew members living and working aboard Honor, a 164 mega-yacht. The upstairs and downstairs worlds collide when this young and single crew, known as yachties, live, love, and work together on-board the luxurious, privately-owned yacht while tending to the ever-changing needs of their wealthy, demanding charter guests. While each crew member brings a different level of experience, they all share a love for this lifestyle that enables them to travel to some of the most beautiful and exotic locales in the world. Each episode features a different set of charter guests moving onto the boat from millionaires, to entertainers to hard-partying groups of well-heeled friends.

programme.title: Pennyworth
programme.desc: Alfred Pennyworth tries to profit off a war-torn London that threatens to be overrun by the fascist Raven Union.

programme.desc: Alfreds plans for his departure to America are put on hold when someone close to him is put in danger. Thomas enlists the help of an old foe, Aleister Crowley.

programme.title: Pennyworth
programme.desc: While Crowley enacts his plan with unintended results, Alfred, Bazza and Daveboy set out to find out who had the nerve to steal from them.

programme.desc: Preparations are underway for Roses big day, but family tensions on both sides threaten to derail proceedings. Ediths arrangement with Marigold is working out well.

programme.desc: Sidney and Geordie investigate a series of post office robberies that appear to be the work of Cambridgeshires very own Bonnie and Clyde.

programme.title: Agatha Christies Marple
programme.desc: Heavy snow is falling in Dartmoor and, to amuse themselves, the guests in the local hotel take part in a seance. The evening becomes sinister when the table-turning suggests a local is in danger.

programme.title: There She Goes
programme.desc: As Em gets excited for Sis annual quiz, Rosie fixates on one drawing she wants repeated. In 2008, the family is shaken when Rosie faces a frightening medical emergency.

programme.title: The Larkins

programme.desc: The Larkins go to extreme lengths to convince Mariette not to leave; the Angela Snow arrives and sets tongues wagging, adding extra fuel started by the Normans.

programme.title: Ripper Street
programme.desc: It is Reids first day back at H Division and the police force he once commanded is now under Inspector Drakes authority. Despite his initial anxiety, it soon becomes clear that Reids investigative instinct is as sharp as ever. He is drawn to a distressed woman who claims to have lost her child from the workhouse, but when it becomes apparent that she is losing her wits he begins to question her testimony.

programme.title: Ripper Street
programme.desc: One month has passed since Inspector Reid returned to H Division. Drake and Reid are once more in harmony, but its now Jacksons turn to feel the pressure as a murder has links to a man who aided Long Susans escape from Newgate. Can Jackson help Reid and Drake solve the case without the truth about Susan emerging? The fate of a young woman depends on it. Meanwhile, Susan works to carve a place for herself at the docks. She begins to reveal more of her dark past to her villainous guardian, Abel Croker.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The Crawleys head to Northumberland for a shooting party at a castle, before returning to Downton to celebrate Christmas.

programme.title: Inspector George Gently
programme.desc: When the body of a young woman is found murdered, Gently and Bacchus investigate a family with unimaginable secrets. But the investigation reveals far more alarming truths.

programme.title: Mum
programme.desc: Cathys clearing out her garage and the family come round to help. Her brother and his partner are fresh from playing golf and making friends with a millionaire. Kellys mum comes round to take an old fridge, and Cathy sees a new side to Kelly. Michael is helping out, too, and faces a decision.

programme.title: Bancroft
programme.desc: Bancroft is faced with a startling blast from the past, which brings the events from 1990 back to the surface. Meanwhile, Katherine wrestles with twists and turns of the new information she is uncovering.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Vera is called to the scene when the body of addiction support worker Angela Konan is found hidden among the bleak woodlands of Northumberland National Park. Vera and her team must pull back the layers of the introverted victims life to uncover her closely-guarded secrets and surprising depths, as it appears an increasingly erratic Angela clashed with two clients in the week before she died. One of whom, Beth Draper, talked to her daughter. Suspicions also turn to Drapers daughter, who went out the night Angela was murdered. Drapers brother in law, Duncan Maxwell, confessed to the murder, explaining that he felt raged over families of addicts not being cared for equally as the addicts themselves. He went back to Angelas cabin, but by then she had disappeared.

programme.desc: When the body of a young woman is found murdered, Gently and Bacchus investigate a family with unimaginable secrets. But the investigation reveals far more alarming truths.

programme.title: Mum
programme.desc: Cathys clearing out her garage and the family come round to help. Her brother and his partner are fresh from playing golf and making friends with a millionaire. Kellys mum comes round to take an old fridge, and Cathy sees a new side to Kelly. Michael is helping out, too, and faces a decision.

programme.title: Bancroft
programme.desc: Bancroft is faced with a startling blast from the past, which brings the events from 1990 back to the surface. Meanwhile, Katherine wrestles with twists and turns of the new information she is uncovering.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Vera is called to the scene when the body of addiction support worker Angela Konan is found hidden among the bleak woodlands of Northumberland National Park. Vera and her team must pull back the layers of the introverted victims life to uncover her closely-guarded secrets and surprising depths, as it appears an increasingly erratic Angela clashed with two clients in the week before she died. One of whom, Beth Draper, talked to her daughter. Suspicions also turn to Drapers daughter, who went out the night Angela was murdered. Drapers brother in law, Duncan Maxwell, confessed to the murder, explaining that he felt raged over families of addicts not being cared for equally as the addicts themselves. He went back to Angelas cabin, but by then she had disappeared.

programme.title: Ripper Street
programme.desc: One month has passed since Inspector Reid returned to H Division. programme.title: Hogans Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan kidnaps Burkhalters sister so he can exchange her for a captured Allied agent.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: In order for Jenny to join the Rondells, a popular club, she has to steal a statue from Pfister Park and bring it to their clubhouse. Joanie is there to help, and they are both caught by Officer Kirk.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Fonzie is rejected several times by a new teacher at Jefferson High. After he kisses her in a final attempt to win her over, she screams and runs out of the house. Roger talks to her and finds out that she is a nun.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye bills the army for his medical services, setting off an investigation; Charlie is forced to investigate the healing power of acupuncture.

programme.desc: Colonel Potter and a friend play a sophisticated April Fools Day joke on the doctors. But he must try to halt the mayhem before Colonel Tucker arrives.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Twenty-seven-year-old Billy Madison must repeat all 12 grades of school in just 24 weeks to earn his fathers respect, and prove he has what it takes to run the familys multimillion-dollar empire. Along the way, Billy falls for his third grade teacher, gets kicked out of school and must face off with his nemesis, not to mention a pesky penguin.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Clear the runway for Derek Zoolander, VH1s three-time male model of the year but his face falls when hippie-chic hes so hot right now Hansel scooters in to steal this years award. The evil fashion guru Mugatu seizes the opportunity to turn Derek into a killing machine. Its a well-designed conspiracy and only with the help of Hansel and a few well-chosen accessories can Derek make the world safe.

programme.title: Benchwarmers 2: Breaking Balls
programme.desc: Ben McGrath (Chris Klein) had major league potential playing professional baseball, but his hopes to play ball literally get crushed. Down on his luck, Ben gets another swing at redemption as a new attorney for Schmood and Associates. His unorthodox boss, Mel (Jon Lovitz), convinces him to manage their eclectic softball team full of misfits and strikeouts. Together, will they have enough spirit to rally and win it all?

programme.title: Little Fockers
programme.desc: After 10 years and two little Fockers, Greg returns and is still battling his father-in-laws suspicions. Will Greg pass Jacks final test and become the familys next patriarch?

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Get ready for a gut-busting, bone-mashing good time in this hilarious horror comedy. There comes a day in every mans life when he has to get off the couch and kill some zombies. When flesh-eating zombies are on the hunt for a bite to eat, its up to slacker Shaun and his best pal to save their friends and family from becoming the next entree.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Andy Stitzer has done quite a few things in his life. Hes got a cushy job stamping invoices at an electronics superstore, a nice apartment with a proud collection of action figures and comic books, good friends, a nice attitude. But theres just one little thing he hasnt quite gotten around to doing yet - something most people have done by his age. Done a lot. Andys never, ever, ever had sex - not even by accident. So is that such a big deal? Well, for Andys buds at the store, it sure is. Although they think hes a bit of an oddball, theres certainly a planet full of stranger (and homelier) guys whove at least had one go at having a go. They consider it their duty to help Andy out of his dire situation and go to great lengths to help him.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Nicholas Angel is a big-city cop who cant be stopped - but hes making everyone else on the force look bad. When he is reassigned to a small, quiet town, he struggles with this new, seemingly idyllic world and his bumbling partner. But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Twenty-seven-year-old Billy Madison must repeat all 12 grades of school in just 24 weeks to earn his fathers respect, and prove he has what it takes to run the familys multimillion-dollar empire. Along the way, Billy falls for his third grade teacher, gets kicked out of school and must face off with his nemesis, not to mention a pesky penguin.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Sex Tape
programme.desc: Jay and Annie are a married couple still very much in love, but ten years and two kids have cooled the passion. To get it back, they decide - why not? - to make a video of themselves trying out every position in The Joy Of Sex in one marathon three-hour session. It seems like a great idea, until they discover that their most private video has gone public. In a panic, they begin a wild night of adventure - tracking down leads, roping in friends, duping Annies boss - all to reclaim their video, their reputation, their sanity, and, most importantly, their marriage.

programme.title: Night School
programme.desc: When accidentally destroying his workplace gets successful salesman Teddy fired, he cant find another decent job unless he finally gets his GED. But two major things stand in his way: Carrie, a teacher with no time for grown-up class clowns, and Stewart, Teddys high school nemesis-turned-principal who will do anything to see him fail. Now every school rule is about to be broken when they all go head-to-head in a wild battle of wits, pranks, and lessons you cant learn in books. Night School is in session!

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: A hilarious, heartfelt look at one guys arduous quest to grow up and get over the heartbreak of being dumped. Struggling musician Peter, after he is jilted by his television star girlfriend Sarah for another guy, runs off to Hawaii on a vacation only to find his ex staying in the same hotel with her new man.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Andy Stitzer has done quite a few things in his life. Hes got a cushy job stamping invoices at an electronics superstore, a nice apartment with a proud collection of action figures and comic books, good friends, a nice attitude. programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Guided by a set of "wedding crashing rules," John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey can charm their way into any wedding and into the hearts of every bridesmaid. But at the biggest nuptials of the year, John breaks the rules and falls for the daughter of the US Secretary of Treasury, and Jeremy is left at the mercy of her "stage-five-clinger" sister. Being there for his buddy, Jeremy follows John to the familys huge estate for a weekend that may even be too wild for these professional party guys.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A has-been scientist, Dr Rick Marshall, gets more than he bargained for when his expedition takes a wrong turn into the Land of the Lost. Now, Marshall, his crack-smart research assistant, Holly, and a redneck survivalist named Will have no weapons, few skills and questionable smarts to survive in a world full of marauding dinosaurs, fantastic creatures and laugh-out-loud comedy.

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: When Albert loses his girlfriend to his moustached nemesis, a mysterious and beautiful woman rides into town and turns his luck around. But when her notorious outlaw husband arrives seeking revenge, Albert must put his new-found courage to the test.

programme.title: Starsky and Hutch
programme.desc: One of televisions most popular duos heads to the big screen in this parody of the popular 1970s series. Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken Hutch Hutchinson as theyre paired for the first time as undercover cops. The new partners must overcome their differences to solve an important case with help from street informant, Huggy Bear and persuasive criminal, Reese Feldman.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each others existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Guided by a set of "wedding crashing rules," John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey can charm their way into any wedding and into the hearts of every bridesmaid. programme.title: Drillbit Taylor
programme.desc: Owen Wilson stars in this riotous comedy from the producers of The 40-Year-Old Virgin and the writers of Superbad. When three young students, Ryan (Troy Gentile), Wade (Nate Hartley) and Emmit (David Dorfman) attend their first day at high school they come across school bully, Filkins (Alex Frost) who channels Hannibal Lecter. Coming up with the idea of getting some protection from this maniac, they place an ad in Soldier of Fortune magazine looking for a bodyguard. Enter Drillbit Taylor (Wilson), not the best but definitely the cheapest of the mercenaries, hit men and bodyguards who respond. Drillbit is steely, dangerous and skilled in covert black-ops and exotic martial arts; hes also a complete fraud. Taylor enrols them in physical and mental training, steeling them, and possibly himself, for the ultimate clash against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Five former basketball teammates, after 30 years since graduating high school, gather at the lake house where they celebrated their biggest victory to mourn the passing of their late coach. Over the course of the Fourth of July weekend, the five friends realise that just because theyve all grown up and started families doesnt mean that theyve lost that old spark. Adulthood is what you make of it, and no one at the lake house is eager to be the grown up of the gang.

programme.title: Starsky and Hutch
programme.desc: One of televisions most popular duos heads to the big screen in this parody of the popular 1970s series. programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each others existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Amateur stuntman Rod Kimble has got a problem with his stepfather, Frank Powell, whos a real jerk. Frank picks on Rod, tosses him around like a rag doll in their weekly sparring sessions, and definitely doesnt respect him, much less his stunts - as he says, "you never sneak up on a man whos been in a chemical fire". But when Frank falls ill, its up to Rod to stage the stunt jump of his life in order to raise the money for Franks heart operation and save him.

programme.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
programme.desc: A delightful comedy about finding love in the most unexpected places. Two successful New Yorkers, Paul and Meryl, are at their wits end with repairing their strained marriage. But when they become the only witnesses to a brutal murder, the police hide them away in Wyoming, together. Now these die-hard city dwellers will have to survive the weather, bears, fresh air, and forced time with one another if they want to make it out alive.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the Police Academy will be open to any and all applicants. Now the first cadets, a collection of oddballs, eccentrics and misfits will soon be let loose on the streets. That is if they somehow manage to graduate in this worldwide hit comedy that started the series of Police Academy films.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jakes dream comes true when he gets to spend the day with his hero, Jimmy Brogan, a former crime reporter. programme.title: The King of Queens

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: When it turns out that Dougs new dentist once had a crush on Carrie, Doug thinks he hurts him on purpose.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Twenty-seven-year-old Billy Madison must repeat all 12 grades of school in just 24 weeks to earn his fathers respect, and prove he has what it takes to run the familys multimillion-dollar empire. Along the way, Billy falls for his third grade teacher, gets kicked out of school and must face off with his nemesis, not to mention a pesky penguin.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Clear the runway for Derek Zoolander, VH1s three-time male model of the year but his face falls when hippie-chic hes so hot right now Hansel scooters in to steal this years award. The evil fashion guru Mugatu seizes the opportunity to turn Derek into a killing machine. Its a well-designed conspiracy and only with the help of Hansel and a few well-chosen accessories can Derek make the world safe.

programme.title: Benchwarmers 2: Breaking Balls
programme.desc: Ben McGrath (Chris Klein) had major league potential playing professional baseball, but his hopes to play ball literally get crushed. Down on his luck, Ben gets another swing at redemption as a new attorney for Schmood and Associates. His unorthodox boss, Mel (Jon Lovitz), convinces him to manage their eclectic softball team full of misfits and strikeouts. Together, will they have enough spirit to rally and win it all?

programme.title: Little Fockers
programme.desc: After 10 years and two little Fockers, Greg returns and is still battling his father-in-laws suspicions. Will Greg pass Jacks final test and become the familys next patriarch?

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Get ready for a gut-busting, bone-mashing good time in this hilarious horror comedy. There comes a day in every mans life when he has to get off the couch and kill some zombies. When flesh-eating zombies are on the hunt for a bite to eat, its up to slacker Shaun and his best pal to save their friends and family from becoming the next entree.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Andy Stitzer has done quite a few things in his life. Hes got a cushy job stamping invoices at an electronics superstore, a nice apartment with a proud collection of action figures and comic books, good friends, a nice attitude. But theres just one little thing he hasnt quite gotten around to doing yet - something most people have done by his age. Done a lot. Andys never, ever, ever had sex - not even by accident. So is that such a big deal? Well, for Andys buds at the store, it sure is. Although they think hes a bit of an oddball, theres certainly a planet full of stranger (and homelier) guys whove at least had one go at having a go. They consider it their duty to help Andy out of his dire situation and go to great lengths to help him.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Nicholas Angel is a big-city cop who cant be stopped - but hes making everyone else on the force look bad. When he is reassigned to a small, quiet town, he struggles with this new, seemingly idyllic world and his bumbling partner. But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Twenty-seven-year-old Billy Madison must repeat all 12 grades of school in just 24 weeks to earn his fathers respect, and prove he has what it takes to run the familys multimillion-dollar empire. Along the way, Billy falls for his third grade teacher, gets kicked out of school and must face off with his nemesis, not to mention a pesky penguin.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Sex Tape
programme.desc: Jay and Annie are a married couple still very much in love, but ten years and two kids have cooled the passion. To get it back, they decide - why not? - to make a video of themselves trying out every position in The Joy Of Sex in one marathon three-hour session. It seems like a great idea, until they discover that their most private video has gone public. In a panic, they begin a wild night of adventure - tracking down leads, roping in friends, duping Annies boss - all to reclaim their video, their reputation, their sanity, and, most importantly, their marriage.

programme.title: Night School
programme.desc: When accidentally destroying his workplace gets successful salesman Teddy fired, he cant find another decent job unless he finally gets his GED. But two major things stand in his way: Carrie, a teacher with no time for grown-up class clowns, and Stewart, Teddys high school nemesis-turned-principal who will do anything to see him fail. Now every school rule is about to be broken when they all go head-to-head in a wild battle of wits, pranks, and lessons you cant learn in books. Night School is in session!

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: A hilarious, heartfelt look at one guys arduous quest to grow up and get over the heartbreak of being dumped. Struggling musician Peter, after he is jilted by his television star girlfriend Sarah for another guy, runs off to Hawaii on a vacation only to find his ex staying in the same hotel with her new man.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Andy Stitzer has done quite a few things in his life. Hes got a cushy job stamping invoices at an electronics superstore, a nice apartment with a proud collection of action figures and comic books, good friends, a nice attitude. But theres just one little thing he hasnt quite gotten around to doing yet - something most people have done by his age. Done a lot. Andys never, ever, ever had sex - not even by accident. So is that such a big deal? Well, for Andys buds at the store, it sure is. They consider it their duty to help Andy out of his dire situation and go to great lengths to help him.

But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Guided by a set of "wedding crashing rules," John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey can charm their way into any wedding and into the hearts of every bridesmaid. But at the biggest nuptials of the year, John breaks the rules and falls for the daughter of the US Secretary of Treasury, and Jeremy is left at the mercy of her "stage-five-clinger" sister. Being there for his buddy, Jeremy follows John to the familys huge estate for a weekend that may even be too wild for these professional party guys.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A has-been scientist, Dr Rick Marshall, gets more than he bargained for when his expedition takes a wrong turn into the Land of the Lost. Now, Marshall, his crack-smart research assistant, Holly, and a redneck survivalist named Will have no weapons, few skills and questionable smarts to survive in a world full of marauding dinosaurs, fantastic creatures and laugh-out-loud comedy.

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: When Albert loses his girlfriend to his moustached nemesis, a mysterious and beautiful woman rides into town and turns his luck around. But when her notorious outlaw husband arrives seeking revenge, Albert must put his new-found courage to the test.

programme.title: Starsky and Hutch
programme.desc: One of televisions most popular duos heads to the big screen in this parody of the popular 1970s series. Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken Hutch Hutchinson as theyre paired for the first time as undercover cops. The new partners must overcome their differences to solve an important case with help from street informant, Huggy Bear and persuasive criminal, Reese Feldman.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each others existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Guided by a set of "wedding crashing rules," John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey can charm their way into any wedding and into the hearts of every bridesmaid. But at the biggest nuptials of the year, John breaks the rules and falls for the daughter of the US Secretary of Treasury, and Jeremy is left at the mercy of her "stage-five-clinger" sister. programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A has-been scientist, Dr Rick Marshall, gets more than he bargained for when his expedition takes a wrong turn into the Land of the Lost. Now, Marshall, his crack-smart research assistant, Holly, and a redneck survivalist named Will have no weapons, few skills and questionable smarts to survive in a world full of marauding dinosaurs, fantastic creatures and laugh-out-loud comedy.

programme.title: Drillbit Taylor
programme.desc: Owen Wilson stars in this riotous comedy from the producers of The 40-Year-Old Virgin and the writers of Superbad. When three young students, Ryan (Troy Gentile), Wade (Nate Hartley) and Emmit (David Dorfman) attend their first day at high school they come across school bully, Filkins (Alex Frost) who channels Hannibal Lecter. Coming up with the idea of getting some protection from this maniac, they place an ad in Soldier of Fortune magazine looking for a bodyguard. Enter Drillbit Taylor (Wilson), not the best but definitely the cheapest of the mercenaries, hit men and bodyguards who respond. Drillbit is steely, dangerous and skilled in covert black-ops and exotic martial arts; hes also a complete fraud. Taylor enrols them in physical and mental training, steeling them, and possibly himself, for the ultimate clash against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Five former basketball teammates, after 30 years since graduating high school, gather at the lake house where they celebrated their biggest victory to mourn the passing of their late coach. Over the course of the Fourth of July weekend, the five friends realise that just because theyve all grown up and started families doesnt mean that theyve lost that old spark. Adulthood is what you make of it, and no one at the lake house is eager to be the grown up of the gang.

programme.title: Starsky and Hutch
programme.desc: One of televisions most popular duos heads to the big screen in this parody of the popular 1970s series. Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken Hutch Hutchinson as theyre paired for the first time as undercover cops. The new partners must overcome their differences to solve an important case with help from street informant, Huggy Bear and persuasive criminal, Reese Feldman.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each others existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Amateur stuntman Rod Kimble has got a problem with his stepfather, Frank Powell, whos a real jerk. Frank picks on Rod, tosses him around like a rag doll in their weekly sparring sessions, and definitely doesnt respect him, much less his stunts - as he says, "you never sneak up on a man whos been in a chemical fire". But when Frank falls ill, its up to Rod to stage the stunt jump of his life in order to raise the money for Franks heart operation and save him.

programme.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
programme.desc: A delightful comedy about finding love in the most unexpected places. Two successful New Yorkers, Paul and Meryl, are at their wits end with repairing their strained marriage. But when they become the only witnesses to a brutal murder, the police hide them away in Wyoming, together. Now these die-hard city dwellers will have to survive the weather, bears, fresh air, and forced time with one another if they want to make it out alive.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the Police Academy will be open to any and all applicants. Now the first cadets, a collection of oddballs, eccentrics and misfits will soon be let loose on the streets. That is if they somehow manage to graduate in this worldwide hit comedy that started the series of Police Academy films.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: The accidental secret agent returns, sent on a mission to stop a group of international assassins before they eliminate a Chinese leader and cause global chaos.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A hospital emergency room shootout investigation puts the CSI team in the middle of a murder case involving the leader of a prominent street gang.

programme.title: Ghosthunter
programme.desc: When documentary filmmaker Ben Lawrence investigates a newspaper article about a local security guard and part-time ghost hunter Jason King, he begins a seven-year journey into a world of haunted homes and broken souls and discovers a story about a man confronting his innermost demons. Soon after they meet, Ben offers to help Jason in his decades long search for the only person who may hold the key to Jasons lost childhood - his father. Part true-crime, part family mystery, GHOSTHUNTER is a real-life ghost story of one man unearthing his past to reclaim his future.

programme.title: William Kunstler Disturbing The Universe
programme.desc: Explores the life of the great American lawyer and advocate for the political underdog, William Kunstler.

programme.title: Three Minutes - A Lengthening
programme.desc: Rare home movie footage shot in Poland in 1938 becomes a priceless historical artifact, documenting people and places obliterated by the Holocaust.

programme.title: Railway Murders
programme.desc: Twenty-eight-year-old Geoffrey Charles Dean, a booking clerk at Ash Vale Railway Station, is murdered by 23-year-old John James Alcott, a railway fireman from Hither Green Depot.

programme.title: Railway Murders
programme.desc: Explores the murder of 73-year-old aristocrat Countess Teresa Lubienska, who was stabbed on the evening of 24th May 1957 on the eastbound Piccadilly line platform of Gloucester Road Underground station.

programme.desc: Amazing archive footage restored in full HD, never before heard eyewitness accounts, documents that have remained secret until now, and photographs recently found.

programme.desc: Thinkers, architects and urban planners discuss ways to increase human interaction in cities.

programme.desc: A look at the global shipping industry, that is responsible for moving ninety percent of everything that is produced or consumed in the modern world.

programme.desc: The true story of how Miami becomes the drug, murder and cash capital of the United States.

programme.title: Cocaine Cowboys: Reloaded

programme.title: Louise Bourgeois
programme.desc: Explores the life of artist Louise Bourgeois.

programme.title: The Amazing Johnathan Documentary
programme.desc: What begins as a documentary following the final tour of a dying magician "The Amazing Johnathan" becomes an unexpected and increasingly bizarre journey as the filmmaker struggles to separate truth from illusion.

programme.title: Wild Assassins
programme.desc: Get up close with the deadliest venomous creatures, including the Sydney Funnel Web Spider and Eastern Diamondback Rattlesnake - some of the planets most dangerous animals.

programme.title: Comic-Con Episode IV: A Fans Hope
programme.desc: A film by Morgan Spurlock explores this amazing cultural phenomenon by following the lives of five attendees as they descend upon the ultimate geek Mecca at San Diego Comic-Con 2010.

programme.title: Ghosthunter
programme.desc: When documentary filmmaker Ben Lawrence investigates a newspaper article about a local security guard and part-time ghost hunter Jason King, he begins a seven-year journey into a world of haunted homes and broken souls and discovers a story about a man confronting his innermost demons. Soon after they meet, Ben offers to help Jason in his decades long search for the only person who may hold the key to Jasons lost childhood - his father. Part true-crime, part family mystery, GHOSTHUNTER is a real-life ghost story of one man unearthing his past to reclaim his future.

programme.title: Louise Bourgeois
programme.desc: Explores the life of artist Louise Bourgeois.

programme.title: The Amazing Johnathan Documentary
programme.desc: What begins as a documentary following the final tour of a dying magician "The Amazing Johnathan" becomes an unexpected and increasingly bizarre journey as the filmmaker struggles to separate truth from illusion.

programme.title: Millers Girl
programme.desc: A talented young writer (Jenna Ortega) embarks on a creative odyssey when her teacher (Martin Freeman) assigns a project that entangles them both in an increasingly complex web. As lines blur and their lives intertwine professor and protge must confront their darkest selves while straining to preserve their individual sense of purpose and the things they hold most dear.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day In The Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of a real-life friendship between beloved neighbour Fred Rogers and journalist Tom Junod.

programme.title: Everybodys Fine
programme.desc: Frank is a recently retired widower who has planned his first family get-together since his wifes death, and is disappointed when his adult children all cancel on him. Accordingly, and against his doctors advice, Frank sets out on a cross-country road trip via bus and train to pay surprise visits to all of them.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Suffering from amnesia, Bourne has left his violent past behind and is living a normal life with girlfriend Marie. But his plans for a peaceful life are crushed when he narrowly escapes an assassination attempt. Now hunted by an unknown enemy, Bourne proves to be neither an easy target nor a person whose skill, determination and resilience can be underestimated.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: An Interpol Agent and Manhattan Assistant District Attorney are determined to bring to justice one of the worlds most powerful banks. Uncovering myriad and reprehensible illegal activities, Salinger and Whitman follow the money from Berlin to Milan to New York to Istanbul. Finding themselves in a high-stakes chase across the globe, their relentless tenacity puts their own lives at risk as their targets will stop at nothing, not even murder, to continue financing terror and war.

programme.title: Jarhead: Law Of Return
programme.desc: Major Ronan Jackson, an accomplished fighter pilot for the Israel Defense Forces and son of a U.S. Senator, is shot down while flying through Syrian airspace. After miraculously surviving the crash, Jackson is taken captive by a group of Hezbollah militiamen. A gripping and powerful story packed with hard-hitting action, "Jarhead: Law of Return" follows a squad of elite soldiers, led by Sergeant Dave Flores, as they risk their own lives in the hopes of saving an ally theyve never met.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: In May 1940, Germany advance into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. In a heroic mission, British and French forces evacuate thousands of soldiers.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day In The Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of a real-life friendship between beloved neighbour Fred Rogers and journalist Tom Junod.
